FieldId.description: ID of the custom field definition.

Id.description: ID of the custom index field.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Ordinal.description: The fieldâ€™s position in the index. Used to determine the order of the fields in the index.

SortDirection.description: The sort direction of the field in the index. Valid values are ASC for ascending order and DESC for descending order.
